data.title: Darrell Fenton Obituary 2019
data.meta_description: Darrell Walter Fenton, 60, of Little Rock, passed away May 21, 2019. He was born in Wichita Falls, Texas to Lawrence and Marilyn Fenton. He is survived by his wife, Martha Fento...
data.text:
Darrell Walter Fenton, 60, of Little Rock, passed away May 21, 2019. He was born in Wichita Falls, Texas to Lawrence and Marilyn Fenton. He is survived by his wife, Martha Fenton; children, Mitchell Fenton (Ember), Matthew Fenton (Alicia) and Meagan Wheeler (Jacob); mother, Marilyn Fenton; brothers, Ron Fenton and Roger Fenton (Laura); sister, Dawn Humphrey (Ronnie); and grandchildren, Addison, Hayley, Alex, Eli and Gavin. He was preceded in death by his father.

Funeral services will be held at 2:00 p.m. on Tuesday, May 28th at Little Rock Funeral Home with Kevin Lyon officiating. Visitation will be held prior to the service starting at 1:00 p.m.

Arrangements by Little Rock Funeral Home, (501)224-2200. Darrell's online guestbook may be signed at www.littlerockfuneralhome.com.

Visitation

MAY 28. 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM (CDT)

Little Rock Funeral Home

8801 Knoedl Ct

Little Rock, AR, 72205

Service

MAY 28. 2:00 PM (CDT)
